pli-tv-pvr1.5:0.2: The monks’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-pvr1.5:1.1: When it comes to the offenses for having sexual intercourse, through how many of the six kinds of origins of offenses do they originate?
pli-tv-pvr1.5:1.3: from body and mind, not from speech. …
pli-tv-pvr1.5:2.1: When it comes to the offense for, out of disrespect, defecating, urinating, or spitting in water, through how many of the six kinds of origins of offenses does it originate?
pli-tv-pvr1.5:2.3: from body and mind, not from speech.
pli-tv-pvr1.5:3.1: The fifth section on origin is finished.
